movie.title: Scorched Earth
movie.description_intro: A bounty hunter named Attica Gage tracks down criminals in a post-apocalyptic Earth.
movie.description_full: A bounty hunter named Attica Gage tracks down criminals in a post-apocalyptic Earth.

movies.title: Under Western Skies
movies.summary: A traveling show arrives in a small Arizona town and finds much opposition from local townspeople. They plan to stage the show in the saloon and the leading lady, Katie (Martha O'Driscoll), gets involved with the local school teacher, Tod (Noah Beery, Jr). and a mysterious masked bandit, King Randall (Leo Carrillo).
movies.description_full: A traveling show arrives in a small Arizona town and finds much opposition from local townspeople. They plan to stage the show in the saloon and the leading lady, Katie (Martha O'Driscoll), gets involved with the local school teacher, Tod (Noah Beery, Jr). and a mysterious masked bandit, King Randall (Leo Carrillo).

movies.title: Le Mans
movies.summary: Almost in breadth and depth of a documentary, this movie depicts an auto race during the 70s on the world's hardest endurance course: Le Mans in France. The race goes over 24 hours on 13.4 kilometers of cordoned country road. Every few hours the two drivers per car alternate - but it's still a challenge for concentration and material. In the focus is the duel between the German Stahler in Ferrari 512LM and the American Delaney in Gulf Team Porsche 917. Delaney is under extraordinary pressure, because the year before he caused a severe accident, in which his friend Lisa's husband was killed.

movies.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
movies.summary: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.
movies.description_full: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.
movies.synopsis: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.

movies.title: The Human Condition II: Road to Eternity
movies.title_english: The Human Condition II: Road to Eternity
movies.title_long: The Human Condition II: Road to Eternity (1959)
movies.summary: Kaji is sent to the Japanese army labeled Red and is mistreated by the vets. Along his assignment, Kaji witnesses cruelties in the army; he revolts against the abusive treatment spent to the recruit Obara that commits suicide; he also sees his friend Shinjô Ittôhei defecting to the Russian border; and he ends in the front to fight a lost battle against the Russian tanks division.
